text: Hi - is this project still being developed or will it be abandoned in light of the REST API being deprecated?
Hi <@U2CC1NDT2>, this will uses api exposed by nodejs sdk

<@U0YNFB22X> - ok 100% please confirm the following for me :
- the current version on gerrit (`explorer_1`) is still using the REST API
- there is another project underway which will be using the HFC node SDK
Yes, you are mostly correct. `explorer_1` will be updated to use node sdk
ok 100% thanks - have you got any idea when the hfc sdk alpha / beta version will be released?
I'm afraid, I do not have any info on that now.
